messages.msgSnippet: Hi friend: It s a new day! My friend tell me a good place, he bought a New Apple iPhone 4 HD 4G 32GB from this website: ishuny.com This phone is the newest
messages.messageBody:
Hi friend:
It's a new day! My friend tell me a good
place, he bought a New Apple iPhone 4 HD 4G 32GB from this website: ishuny.com This phone is the newest model and it is
very cheap, If you want new and muti-function digital products, this website
must be your best choice. If you interested, you can have a try and placed an
order on this web.
Hope this may be useful for you.
Best
regards

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
